definitions.definition: Swollen or inflated in shape, as if filled with air; pillow-like.

examples: A puffy fat man in a tracksuit came jogging around the corner.

definitions.definition: Speaking or writing in an exaggeratedly eloquent and self-important manner.

main_definition: Swollen or inflated in shape, as if filled with air; pillow-like.
secondary_definitions: Speaking or writing in an exaggeratedly eloquent and self-important manner.
